monq.stuff

Interface Drainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPipe, CharSequenceFeeder, DfaRunFeeder, Pipe, ReaderFeeder

    public interface Drainer
extends Service

    the dual to Feeder.

    Hint: A Drainer can be easily implemented by subclassing AbstractPipe.

    Author:
    © 2005 Harald Kirsch

      • setIn

        void setIn(java.io.InputStream out,
         boolean closeOnExit)

        specifies the InputStream where to fetch the data in the run() method.

        Parameters:
        closeOnExit - if true, instructs the Drainer to close in before exiting run().
